query:
SELECT 
    i.id as ingredient_id,
    i.name,
    i.unit as unit_value,
    i.restaurantId as ing_restaurant_id,
    i.costPerUnit,
    iu.id as unit_id,
    iu.name as unit_name,
    ic.id as conversion_id,
    ic.fromUnit,
    ic.toUnit,
    ic.conversionFactor,
    ic.restaurantId as conv_restaurant_id
FROM ingredients i
LEFT JOIN ingredientUnits iu ON i.unit = iu.id
LEFT JOIN ingredientConversions ic ON i.id = ic.ingredientId
WHERE i.name LIKE '%Scallops%';
